solution_line_template: Amanda's total number of points from the first {num_quizzes_initial} quizzes is {total_points_initial} because {num_quizzes_initial} x {avg_score_initial} = <<{num_quizzes_initial}*{avg_score_initial}={total_points_initial}>>{total_points_initial}
She needs a total of {required_total_points} points because {total_quizzes} x {required_avg_score} = <<{total_quizzes}*{required_avg_score}={required_total_points}>>{required_total_points}

She needs to score a {score_needed_final_quiz} on the final quiz because {required_total_points} - {total_points_initial} = <<{required_total_points}-{total_points_initial}={score_needed_final_quiz}>>{score_needed_final_quiz}
